description:
Kenshiro and the others set out for the South Star capital, but Ken-Oh`s Assassin Squad appear before them. Kenshiro dodges Jenimo`s two-sword style and gives him a pounding!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juza vs. Raoh! An End of the Legend of the Invincible!!
Le combat de Jûza contre Raoul ! La légende de l`invincible prend fin !!
対決ジュウザVSラオウ! 今無敵伝説に終止符を!!
